backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with access control, user/product/order/cart profile stores, sustainable living categories, and related data types and modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two admin-focused User Guide features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across routing, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining saffron/orange OKLCH color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting favicon, viewport, title, and loading the React main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling hash routing, identity loading, onboarding modal, page rendering, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Renders an admin-only access denied message with a shield icon and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/MarketplaceHeade: Marketplace header with logo, search, categories, user guide link, account access, cart indicator, and mobile menu.
Modal guiding users to select account type and submit profile details, handling buyer and seller registration flows.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product info and image placeholder with add‑to‑cart handling, navigation, and stock status.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of ProductCard components with loading skeletons and empty‑state handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file placeholder for a profile setup modal component.
Provides increment/decrement UI for numeric quantities with min/max and disabled handling.
frontend/src/constants/sustainableLiving: Defines sustainable living category list with helpers to fetch category data by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated user is an admin via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Provides cart query and mutation hooks with unimplemented backend methods and subtotal calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompanyBankDetails: Hooks for fetching and updating company bank details, currently stubbed with unimplemented backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, fetching, checking out, and canceling orders, all currently returning placeholders due to missing backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Implements product listing and fetching via actor calls, with addProduct mutation stubbed out pending backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and registering role-specific profiles, all currently stubbed due to unimplemented backend endpoints.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines color variables for light and dark themes with a saffron/orange palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Renders the user account page with profile display and editing, gated by identity and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Shows a browsable product grid with search, category, price filtering, and sorting options.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, allowing quantity changes and item removal, with identity checks and subtotal calculation.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the checkout UI, validates delivery details, computes subtotal, and submits an order via useCheckout.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyAccountPage.ts: Provides an admin-only form to view and update company bank details, with authentication and editing controls.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryPartnerOnboar: Handles delivery partner registration with form validation, identity checks, and submission to create a partner profile.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the landing page with hero content, category shortcuts, and featured products fetched from useListProducts.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific order, including items, status, and an option to cancel pending orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with status badges and navigation to detailed views, handling empty and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info, handles quantity selection, and adds items to the cart with identity checks and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SellerPortalPage.tsx: Provides a seller-only form to add new products, with identity and permission checks and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/UserGuidePage.tsx: Renders a multi-tab user guide for buyers, sellers, and optionally admins with step-by-step instructions and illustrations.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Implements hash-based routing, parsing route, params, and query values, and provides a navigate helper.
frontend/src/types/stubs.ts: Defines placeholder types for users, profiles, cart items, orders, and enums used before backend implementation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and enabled plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state and requirements for building an ONDC‑compliant e‑commerce marketplace named Bozarhaat. Includes architectural notes, required images, and a list of existing implemented features.
